resources:
AndroidAtWork
Overlay permission is required to draw the the UI after phone unlock during Intervention phase #1. Click below to test what the screen looks like.
# popup screen (int1) - Unlocked due to impending bedtime Your bedtime is nearing. If you think using your phone is really important, please tell us the purpose of why you are using it. # popup screen (int1) - Unlocked due to overuse Usage goal exceeded! If you still consider using it important, please tell us the purpose of why you are using it.
Device id: %s
WorkTimeSelectorActivity This application tracks foreground applicatin changes when you are using your smartphone.
